definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Good ability for listening , speaking , reading and writing english.
sentences.chinese: 良好的英语听说读写能力为佳。

sentences.english: These disk sheets and the read-write devices are enclosed together.
sentences.chinese: 这些盘片与读写装置是密封在一起的。

sentences.english: The application needed the ability to read and write data from a back-end database.
sentences.chinese: 应用程序需要能够从后端数据库读写数据。

sentences.english: The mechanical device that moves something , usually read/write head.
sentences.chinese: 一种机械装置，用于移动诸如读写磁头之类的部件。

sentences.english: Children are tested every six weeks on their reading, writing, speaking and listening comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 每隔六周就会对孩子们进行听说读写的测试。

sentences.english: We all know listening, speaking, reading, writing and translating are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 我们都知道，听说读写译是密切相关的。

sentences.english: Promoting literacy is one of Laura Bush's main projects as first lady.
sentences.chinese: 推广读写能力是萝拉身为第一夫人的主要计画。

sentences.english: Good commend of written and spoken English.
sentences.chinese: 良好英语听说读写能力。

sentences.english: This stream refreshes the pool of minimally literate Americans.
sentences.chinese: 这个潮流使得读写能力最低的美国人大量增加。

sentences.english: Tingshuo has made very good progress with his literacy work this year.
sentences.chinese: 这一年，朔宝在读写上取得了很好的进步。

sentences.english: Although he had had little formal education, he could read and write well.
sentences.chinese: 尽管他接受很少正规教育，但他的读写能力佷好。

sentences.english: Only a small buffer is needed to read or write data.
sentences.chinese: 它只需要使用一个很小的缓冲区来读写数据。

sentences.english: The task of this article is designing a kind of general purpose IC card reader-writer.
sentences.chinese: 本课题的任务是设计一种通用型IC卡读写器。

sentences.english: Nearly 99 percent of Albanians are literate.
sentences.chinese: 近99%的阿国国民具备读写能力。

sentences.english: Good Command of English, could use English as working language.
sentences.chinese: 有较好的英语听说读写能力，英语可以作为工作语言。

sentences.english: Fluent oral English and writing skills.
sentences.chinese: 具有一定的英语听说读写能力。

definition: to miss a line/to confuse two lines
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
